          <title>
            <string language="en">Pure water from muddy water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reines Wasser vom schlammigen Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'eau pure de l'eau boueuse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Água pura da água enlameada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Acqua pura da acqua fangosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθαρό ύδωρ από το λασπώδες ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Agua pura del agua fangosa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This flowchart shows an incorrect way of obtaining pure water from muddy water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">condensing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">muddy water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pure water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steam</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Flußdiagramm zeigt eine falsche Methode des
Erhaltens des reinen Wassers vom schlammigen Wasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet organigramme montre une voie incorrecte 
d'obtenir l'eau pure de l'eau boueuse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este fluxograma mostra uma maneira incorreta de 
obter a água pura da água enlameada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso mostra un modo errato di
ottenere l'acqua pura da acqua fangosa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ροής εμφανίζει ανακριβή τρόπο το 
καθαρό ύδωρ από το λασπώδες ύδωρ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama muestra una manera incorrecta de 
obtener el agua pura del agua fangosa.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kondensieren</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schlammiges Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
